@description.body:

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
This mixin exposes all basic methods to manage widget children as public methods.
It can only be included into instances of {@link Widget}.

To optimize the method calls the including widget should call the method
{@link #remap} in its defer function. This will map the protected
methods to the public ones and save one method call for each function.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{qx.ui.core.LayoutItem[]} The children array (Arrays are
reference types, please do not modify them in-place)
@return.description:
The children array (Arrays are
reference types, please do not modify them in-place)

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Returns true when the widget has children.
@return.description: Returns true when the widget has children.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the index position of the given widget if it is a child widget. Otherwise it returns -1. This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.Widget} the widget to query for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The index position or -1 when the given widget is no child of this layout.
@return.description: The index position or -1 when the given widget is no child of this layout.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Adds a new child widget.

The supported keys of the layout options map depend on the layout manager
used to position the widget. The options are documented in the class
documentation of each layout manager {@link qx.ui.layout}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Add a child widget at the specified index

This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
(e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} Index, at which the widget will be inserted
@param.description: Index, at which the widget will be inserted

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Add a widget before another already inserted widget

This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
(e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: before {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} Widget before the new widget will be inserted.
@param.description: Widget before the new widget will be inserted.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Add a widget after another already inserted widget

This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
(e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: after {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} Widget, after which the new widget will be inserted
@param.description: Widget, after which the new widget will be inserted

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Remove the widget at the specified index.

This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
(e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} Index of the widget to remove.
@param.description: Index of the widget to remove.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Array} An array of the removed children.
@return.description: An array of the removed children.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Mapping of protected methods to public.
This omits an additional function call when using these methods. Call
this methods in the defer block of the including class.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: members {Map} The including classes members map
